channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: From Stuttgart to Detroit: How Europe’s car giants are bracing for Trump’s tariff tsunami
item.description: European automakers face price hikes, production shifts and supply chain chaos as Trump’s 25% tariff upends the transatlantic car market.

item.description: Only from the ashes of such a magnificent and glorious failure can Hollywood return to its glory days.
